Description:
Detects deletion attempts of MacOS Time Machine backups via the native backup utility "tmutil".
An adversary may perform this action before launching a ransonware attack to prevent the victim from restoring their files.


Author: Pratinav Chandra
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Time Machine Backup Deletion Attempt Via Tmutil - MacOS
Query: sourcetype like 'macos-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%/tmutil' and command like '%tmutil%') and command like '%delete%')
